<!-- on the root element set the dir attribute for rtl display format -->
<html lang="en" dir="rtl">
    [code goes here]
</html>

<!-- html structure is the same -->
html[dir="rtl"]{
    .cmx{
        &-navbar {
            background-image: linear-gradient(to left, $medium-blue 43px, $true-blue 42px);
            
            &__trigger{
                left:0;
                right:auto;
            }
            &__menu{
                &-sub {
                    margin-right: 43px;
                    margin-left: 0;
                }
                &-label{
                    padding: 0.875rem 0.75rem 0 0;
                }
            }
            &.entity-selector-open{
                .cmx-navbar{
                    &__legal-entity{
                        &-toggle{
                            transform: rotate(-90deg);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            &.collapsed{
                .cmx-navbar{
                    &__legal-entity{
                        transform: translate(160px, 0);
                        max-height:0;
                    }
                    &__menu-label{
                        padding-left:auto;
                        padding-right:0;
                    }
                }
                
                & + .page-wrapper{
                    margin-left: auto;
                    margin-right: 43px;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

// ╔══════════════════════════════╗
// ║  MOBILE-RTL SPECIFIC STYLES  ║
// ╚══════════════════════════════╝

@media (max-width : 576px) {
    html[dir="rtl"]{
        .cmx{
            &-navbar,
            &-navbar.cmx-navbar-static-side{
                left:auto;
                right:-100%;
                transition: right 250ms ease;
            }

            &-navbar{
                background-image:none;
                & + .page-wrapper{
                    margin-right: 0 !important;
                    margin-left:auto;
                    margin-top:0;
                }
                &__trigger{
                    right:15px;
                    left:auto;
                    transition: right 250ms ease;
                }
                
                &__legal-entity{
                    &-listing{
                        left:auto;
                        right:-100%;
                    }
                    &-footer{
                        text-align: left;
                    }
                }
                &__menu{
                    width: $sidebar-width;
                    background-image:linear-gradient(to left, $medium-blue 43px, $true-blue 43px);
                }
    
    
                &.collapsed{ // in responsive this is actually the expanded status
                    transform:none;
                    right:0;
    
                    .cmx-navbar{
                        &__trigger{
                            transform:none;
                            left:auto;
                            right:calc(100vw - 36px);
                        }

                        &__legal-entity{
                            transform:none;
                            max-height:200px;
                        }
    
                        &__menu{

                            &-link{ // we are this specific to allow buttons as well
                                text-align: right;
                            }

                            &-label{
                                padding-right: 0.75rem;
                                padding-left:0;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
    
                &.entity-selector-open{
                    right:-100%;
                    left:auto;

                    .cmx-navbar{
                        &__legal-entity{
                            &-listing{
                                left:auto;
                                right:0;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
